title: Steel Shell System - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Harem   Mystery   Supernatural   Tragedy
tags: Apocalypse   Game Elements   Gore   Male Protagonist   Mutated Creatures   Otaku   System Administrator   Weak to Strong   Zombies
author: Lazy Cat Stealing Books   偷看书的懒
description:
Qian Lingfeng, an avid Otaku, received the “Steel Shell System” by the choice of fate.

After he conquered the world, became a rich tyrant, met all kinds of beautiful women and opened a harem, and achieved the ultimate fantasy of thousands of Otakus, he suddenly realized that things seemed far from simple!

…

The end befell onto the world and zombies suddenly started appearing. Fierce beasts are now in power, bloodthirsty Zergs now roam and dominate the earth, and human lives are now reduced to dirt.

Where will the weak humans go in this world? Is there even a place left for them to get a foothold? Is humanity going to be extinct?

Or… can an Otaku save the fate of the human race?>
